content: this legal text provides an overview of a case involving an inheritance dispute the parties involved are not named but it includes a spouse children and other relatives one participant referred to as pr is entitled to receive a sum of 375760 euros the progress of the case is summarized over a period of 360 days from july 23 2019 to july 29 2019 the parties reached a conciliatory agreement during a mediation meeting held in nola italy on july 29 2019 the agreement states that pr transfers three properties in nola to ss who is the mother and another property pn to pm who is the sister the other heir pf acknowledges and does not oppose this arrangement the agreement was signed and closed at 700 pm on july 29 2019 the text also mentions the payment of mediation fees and costs
